title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
Cant find any liquid on board.

Tested with genuine 85W charger.
Had only charging symbol on display even when left on charge for 30 minutes and press power button there was charging symbol.

Tested with two new and working batteries and it boots, but reboot every 10 secs.
Got Apple logo on screen and loading bar. 
During boot when I unplug charger it shut down but I am sure batteries got charge.

Tested with new keyboard, trackpad, removed SSD and unpluged small board and camera flex - same issue.

Any idea?

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message: So it seems like it doesn't run off the battery. Will it boot without the battery plugged in? Any history drop liquid etc? Inspect very closely for any hints of corrosion near the ISL6259, SMC, U1900, U1950, the BIOS, and U7090.

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
Exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H?
Do you note battery voltage slowly increasing when both charger and battery are connected?

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
JohnB8812 - won?t boot without battery - board looks clean, no liquid - client say there was no drop

2informaticos - PPBUS_G3H got 12.55V
?Do you note battery voltage slowly increasing when both charger and battery are connected?? yes

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
Does it run in SMC bypass mode?
Post voltage for pins 9 & 15 of U7100.
Check exact value in ohm for R7121/22 and R7151/52.

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message: It should boot from just the charger. As 2informaticos suggested, measure resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of the ISL6259

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
Yes, it does run in SMC bypass mode.

U7100/9 @ 0.035V
U7100/15 @ 0.060V

R7121 @ 10.5Ohm
R7122 @ 10Ohm

R7151 @ 2.3Ohm
R7152 @ 0.2Ohm

Resistance on ISL6259:
17/18 @ 3.7Ohm
27/28 @ 20.7Ohm

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
"Yes, it does run in SMC bypass mode."
So there is a sensor issue.
Check all sensors output from pages 42-45...

title: 820-4924 reboots every 10 seconds.
message:
Don?t know if did good measurements - got zero experience with sensors.

Had only known good battery connected and 85W charger.

SMC_CPU_HI_ISENSE @ 0.299V
